hero.badge: Urwego rw'Igihugu rw'Amashuri ya Tekinike n'ubumenyingiro
hero.title: Iga Ubwenge bw'Ikoranabuhanga Igihe cyose, Ahantu cyose
hero.description: Guhuza n'amashuri 165 y'ubwenge n'ikoranabuhanga mu Rwanda. Komeza kwiga igihe cyose, ahantu cyose.

features.title: Kwiga Nta Nzira
features.subtitle: Ibikoresho byuzuye byo kwiga ubwenge bw'ikoranabuhanga
features.communicationDesc: Guhuza vuba n'abigisha n'abanyeshuri. Gabana ibitekerezo, aza ibibazo, kandi wubaka hamwe mu nzira y'iyandikana.
features.resourcesDesc: Reba ibikoresho by'amashuri, amavideo, n'inyandiko. Kuraho ibikoresho kugira ngo wiga igihe cyose.
features.videoDesc: Injira mu isomo imbonankubone hamwe na mwarimu we. Kwitabira mu nzira y'iyandikana n'ubwenge.
features.networkDesc: Guhuza n'abanyeshuri n'abigisha kuva mu mashuri 165. Ubaka urwego rw'ubwenge mu Rwanda.
features.securityDesc: Amakuru yose arinzwe neza. Ubwiyunge bw'ubwenge bw'ubwiyunge bw'ikoranabuhanga.
features.progressDesc: Menya inzira yawe y'amashuri hamwe n'ubwiyunge bw'ubwenge.

cta.title: Tangira Kwiga Ubu
cta.subtitle: Injira TSSANYWHERE - Aho ubwenge bw'ikoranabuhanga ntiyahagarika

footer.description: Urwego rw'Igihugu rw'Amashuri y'Ubwenge - igihe cyose, ahantu cyose.
